teal.render

Interface HasPosition

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IsPickable, PhysicalElement, TAbstractRendered, TNode3D, TRendered, TShapeNode, TTransformGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccelerationVector, AmpereanCircleNode3D, AmpereanRectangleNode3D, ArrayNode, Arrow, ArrowNode, ArrowWallNode, Ball, BoxNode, Circuit, Coil, ComponentForceVector, ConductingSphericalShell, ConstantField, CurrentSlab, CurrentSlabNode3D, CylindricalMagnet, Dipole, ElectricDipole, ElectricDipoleNode3D, EMObject, EMRadiator, EnergyParticle, EngineRendered, FieldConvolution, FieldDirectionGrid, FieldLine, FieldLineNode, FieldValue, FieldVector, FiniteWire, FiniteWireNode, FluxFieldLine, ForceVector, Fret, GeneralVector, GridNode, Helix, HelixNode, HollowCurrentShell, ImageNode, InclinedPlane, InclinedPlaneNode, InfiniteConductingPlane, InfiniteLineCharge, InfiniteWire, Line, LineChargeNode, LineMagneticDipole, LineNode, MagDipoleNode3D, MagneticDipole, MoveNode, MultiShapeNode, Node3D, Particle, PhysicalObject, PointCharge, PointChargeConductingSphere, RadiationFieldLine, RectangleNode, RelativeFLine, Rendered, RigidBar, RingOfCurrent, Seafloor, Seafloor.EdgeNode, Seafloor.StripeNode, ShapeNode, SimRendered, SlidingBox, SolidArrowNode, Spatial, SpatialField, SpatialPhysicalObject, SpatialTextLabel, SpatialVector, SpatialVisualization, Sphere, SphereNode, Stem, StemNode, TeachSpinBase.TellFlux, TextLabelNode, TrailVisualization, VelocityVector, Wall, WallNode, WeightedPendulumNode, WeightedPhysicalPendulum, WireNode

    public interface HasPosition
    Objects that have a physical position should implement this interface. We assume Objects that implements this interface will store their position using x, y, and z coordinates in a Vector3d. By implementing this interface, a Object allows read/write access to itsposition. Vector3d objects can be used to set and retrieve position.
